edge_types.name: The name of the individual.
edge_types.Born in/Died in: Years of birth and death, if applicable.
edge_types.Works for: Organizations the person is or was affiliated with.
edge_types.Invented/Discovered: List of technologies or concepts the person has invented or discovered.

edge_types.name: Name of the organization.
edge_types.Founded in: Year and location the organization was founded.
edge_types.Operates in: Regions where the organization has operations.
edge_types.Produces/Offers: Products, services, or technologies the organization provides.
edge_types.Invests in: Technologies, markets, or other organizations it has invested in.
edge_types.Collaborates on: Partnerships or collaborations with other organizations or individuals.

edge_types.name: Name of the object.
edge_types.Part of/Contains: Components or contents of the object, if applicable.
edge_types.Produced/Offers: If the object is a product, which organization offers it.
edge_types.Used by/Utilized by: Who uses the object, if it's a tool or technology.

edge_types.name: Name of the concept.
edge_types.Is a/Type of: Broader category the concept falls under.
edge_types.Related to: Concepts or technologies related to this one.
edge_types.Contrasts with: Concepts or technologies it is in opposition to.

edge_types.name: Name of the event.
edge_types.Occurs in: Location and date of the event.
edge_types.Involves/Includes: People or organizations involved in the event.
edge_types.Related to: Concepts, actions, or technologies related to the event.

edge_types.name: Name of the technology.
edge_types.Invented/Discovered: Who invented or discovered the technology.
edge_types.Used by/Utilized by: Organizations or products that use this technology.
edge_types.Invests in: Organizations or markets investing in this technology.

edge_types.name: Name of the market.
edge_types.Targets/Addresses Market: Products or technologies aimed at this market.
edge_types.Related to: Technologies or concepts relevant to this market.

edge_types.name: Name of the product.
edge_types.Used by/Utilized by: Typical users or applications of the product.
